45#ifndef __sockpp_unix_acceptor_h
46#define __sockpp_unix_acceptor_h
47
48#include "sockpp/acceptor.h"
49#include "sockpp/unix_stream_socket.h"
50
51namespace sockpp {
52
54
61
62class unix_acceptor : public acceptor
63{
65 using base = acceptor;
66
67 // Non-copyable
68 unix_acceptor(const unix_acceptor&) = delete;
69 unix_acceptor& operator=(const unix_acceptor&) = delete;
70
71public:
75 unix_acceptor() {}
82 unix_acceptor(const unix_address& addr, int queSize = DFLT_QUE_SIZE) {
83 if (auto res = open(addr, queSize); !res)
84 throw std::system_error{res.error()};
85 }
92 unix_acceptor(const unix_address& addr, int queSize, error_code& ec) noexcept {
93 ec = open(addr, queSize).error();
94 }
99 unix_address address() const { return unix_address(base::address()); }
103 using base::open;
110 result<> open(const unix_address& addr, int queSize = DFLT_QUE_SIZE) {
111 return base::open(addr, queSize);
112 }
118 result<unix_socket> accept() noexcept {
119 if (auto res = base::accept(); res)
120 return unix_socket{res.release()};
121 else
122 return res.error();
123 }
124};
125
127}; // namespace sockpp
128
129#endif // __sockpp_unix_acceptor_h
